traits.name: Hades' Aid
traits.desc: Your Call becomes Hades' Aid, which briefly makes you Invisible; your God Gauge starts 10/20/30% full.

traits.name: Aspect of Zagreus (Stygian Blade)
traits.desc:
The form in which the blade of the underworld first revealed itself.
A blade such as this seeks not to remain idle for more than an aeon or two.

traits.name: Aspect of Nemesis
traits.desc:
For 3 Sec. after you Special, your Attack may deal Critical damage.
One of Nyx's daughters once brandished the blade against the arrogant.

traits.name: Aspect of Poseidon
traits.desc:
Your Special dislodges  from foes.
Even before he ruled the seas, the blade's first bearer liked making a splash.

traits.name: Aspect of Arthur
traits.desc:
You have Holy Excalibur*, and +50  to your Life Total.
Peace and destruction await a kingdom governed by the rule of might.

traits.name: Breaching Slash
traits.desc: Your Attack deals +300% damage to Armor.

traits.name: Cruel Thrust
traits.desc: Your Thrust deals +200% damage and has a +40% Critical chance.

traits.name: Cursed Slash

traits.desc: Your Special makes you lunge ahead, then become Sturdy for 0.8 Sec.

traits.name: Double Nova

traits.name: Hoarding Slash

traits.name: Greater Consecration

traits.name: Aspect of Zagreus (Eternal Spear)
traits.desc:
The form in which the eternal spear first revealed itself.
Its shape reflects its bearer's true self, hiding its own all the while.

traits.name: Aspect of Achilles
traits.desc:
After your Special, you can retrieve your Spear with Raging Rush.
The greatest of the Greeks was peerless in battle, up close and from afar.

traits.name: Aspect of Hades
traits.desc:
Your Spin Attack becomes Punishing Sweep.
The god of the dead discarded the eternal spear for a larger counterpart.

traits.name: Aspect of Guan Yu
traits.desc:
You have the Frost Fair Blade*, but your life and healing are reduced.
A mighty general shall battle with unmatched ferocity to unite his people.

traits.name: Extending Jab
traits.desc: Your Attack has more range and deals +40% damage to distant foes.

traits.name: Exploding Launcher

traits.desc: Your Spin Attack deals +125% damage and hits a larger area.

traits.name: Quick Spin
traits.desc: Your Spin Attack charges and recovers much faster.

traits.name: Flurry Jab
traits.desc: Hold Attack to strike rapidly, but you cannot Spin Attack.

traits.name: Charged Skewer
traits.desc: Hold Special to charge your skewer for up to +200% base damage.

traits.name: Serrated Point

traits.name: Winged Serpent
traits.desc: Your Frost Fair Blade Spin Attack travels for +80% longer.

traits.name: Aspect of Zagreus (Shield of Chaos)
traits.desc:
The form in which the shield of chaos first revealed itself.
Sometimes the bone-etched visage shudders as though it means to speak.

traits.name: Aspect of Chaos
traits.desc:
After you Bull Rush, your next Special throws multiple shields.
All sprang from the primordial depths; only one artifact bore witness.

traits.name: Aspect of Zeus
traits.desc:
Your Special is replaced with the Blitz Disc*.
Once he became king of the Olympians, he truly had nothing left to fear.

traits.name: Aspect of Beowulf
traits.desc:
You have Naegling's Board** but take +10% damage
Would that the stalwart warrior-king's sword offered similar protection.

traits.name: Dread Flight
traits.desc: Your Special can strike up to 4 additional foes before returning.

traits.name: Sudden Rush
traits.desc: Your Bull Rush charges much faster.

traits.name: Pulverizing Blow
traits.desc: Your Attack hits twice, but does not knock foes away.

traits.name: Dashing Wallop
traits.desc: Your Dash Attack deals +50% damage in a larger area.

traits.name: Explosive Return

traits.desc: Your Bull Rush deals +400% damage to Armor.

traits.name: Charged Shot
traits.desc: Your Bull Rush instead fires a piercing shot that deals 80 base damage.

traits.name: Charged Flight
traits.desc: Hold Special to charge your throw for up to +200% base damage.

traits.name: Empowering Flight
traits.desc: After your Special hits, your next 2 Attacks deal +80% damage.

traits.name: Dashing Flight
traits.desc: While you Dash, your Special is faster and deals +200% damage.

traits.name: Ferocious Guard
traits.desc: After blocking a foe, gain +20% damage and move speed for 10 Sec.

traits.name: Unyielding Defense
traits.desc: After using your Naegling's Board Cast, you are Sturdy for 3 Sec.

traits.name: Aspect of Zagreus (Heart Seeking Bow)
traits.desc:
The form in which the heart-seeking bow first revealed itself.
It senses stalwart hearts, mostly to stop them but occasionally to be used.

traits.name: Aspect of Chiron
traits.desc:
Your Special automatically seeks the foe last struck by your Attack.
When first it was fashioned, the centaur lord himself affirmed its might.

traits.name: Aspect of Hera
traits.desc:
Your Cast loads into your next Attack, firing on impact.
None dared approach the queen of the gods, a reputation she cultivated.

traits.name: Aspect of Rama
traits.desc:
You have Celestial Sharanga*, which can cause Shared Suffering.
The preserver's marksmanship is one of his many unequaled qualities

traits.name: Twin Shot
traits.desc: Your Attack fires 2 shots side-by-side, but has reduced range.

traits.name: Sniper Shot
traits.desc: Your Attack deals +200% damage to distant foes.

traits.name: Explosive Shot
traits.desc: Your Attack deals +300% damage in an area, but charges slower.

traits.name: Flurry Shot
traits.desc: Hold Attack to shoot rapidly, but you cannot Power Shot.

traits.name: Piercing Volley
traits.desc: Your Special pierces foes and deals +400% damage to Armor.

traits.name: Perfect Shot
traits.desc: Your Power Shot is easier to execute and deals +150% damage.

traits.name: Relentless Volley
traits.desc: Your Special shoots +4 shots.

traits.name: Triple Shot
traits.desc: Your Attack fires 3 shots in a spread pattern.

traits.name: Charged Volley
traits.desc: Hold Special for up to 250% base damage; minimum range is reduced.

traits.name: Chain Shot
traits.desc: Your Attack bounces to up to 3 foes, dealing +15% damage for each.

traits.name: Point-Blank Shot
traits.desc: Your Attack deals +150% damage to nearby foes.

traits.name: Concentrated Volley
traits.desc: Your Special deals  +3 base damage for each consecutive hit to a foe.

traits.name: Repulse Shot
traits.desc: Your Celestial Sharanga Attack creates a Blast Wave around you.

traits.name: Aspect of Zagreus (Twin Fists)
traits.desc:
The form in which the Twin Fists first revealed themselves.
The twin fists are bound to their bearer, but most fiercely to each other.

traits.name: Aspect of Talos
traits.desc:
Your Special becomes Magnetic Cutter; its pull deals 20 damage.
They filled the bronze giant with power, conforming to its massive frame.

traits.name: Aspect of Demeter
traits.desc:
After landing 12 strikes, your next Special* hits more times.
They were a natural fit; her power to bring life, their power to take it.

traits.name: Aspect of Gilgamesh
traits.desc:
You have the Claws of Enkidu, whose Dash-Upper can Maim** foes.
The god-king inherited the furry-man's savage strength and stout heart.

traits.name: Breaching Cross
traits.desc: Your Dash-Strike pierces foes and deals +900% damage to Armor

traits.name: Rolling Knuckle
traits.desc: Your Dash-Strike deals +60% damage; added to Attack sequence.

traits.name: Long Knuckle
traits.desc: Your Attack has more range and deals +10% damage

traits.name: Draining Cutter
traits.desc: Whenever your Special slays foes, restore 2% life

traits.name: Concentrated Knuckle
traits.desc: Your Attack deals +5 base damage for each uninterrupted hit to a foe.

traits.name: Explosive Upper
traits.desc: Your Dash-Upper deals +100% damage in an area

traits.name: Flying Cutter
traits.desc: Hold Special for longer range and up to +100% base damage

traits.name: Rush Kick
traits.desc: Your Special becomes an advancing kick that also deals 40 base damage twice

traits.name: Quake Cutter
traits.desc: After using your Special, deal 90 damage in an area where you land

traits.name: Kinetic Launcher
traits.desc: Your Special becomes a charged ranged attack that deals 50 base damage.

traits.name: Heavy Knuckle
traits.desc: Your Attack becomes a slower 3-hit sequence, each deals 40 base damage.

traits.name: Colossus Knuckle
traits.desc: While using your Attack or Special, you are Sturdy

traits.name: Rending Claws
traits.desc: Maim-afflicted foes take +25% damage and move 30% slower

traits.name: Aspect of Zagreus (Adamant Rail)
traits.desc:
The form in which the Adamant Rail first revealed itself.
The image of the noble gryphon belies its true intent but not its power.

traits.name: Aspect of Eris
traits.desc:
For 4 seconds after absorbing your Special's blast, deal more damage.
Strife herself once stole away with it, such was its destructive allure.

traits.name: Aspect of Hestia
traits.desc:
After you manually Reload, your next shot is empowered.
Before she was goddess of the hearth, she specialized in another type of fire.

traits.name: Aspect of Lucifer
traits.desc:
You have Igneus Eden*, which launches volatile Hellfire.
As he fell from grace, he nonetheless fought back in all his defiant fury.

traits.name: Flurry Fire
traits.desc: Your Attack is faster and more accurate; gain +6 ammo capacity.

traits.name: Ricochet Fire
traits.desc: Your attack bounces to +1 other foe

traits.name: Spread Fire
traits.desc: Your Attack becomes a short spread that deals 40 base damage; lose -6 ammo capacity.

traits.name: Explosive Fire
traits.desc: Your Attack deals damage in an area and briefly slows foes.

traits.name: Delta Chamber
traits.desc: Your Attack is a 3-round burst; you never have to Reload.

traits.name: Piercing Fire
traits.desc: Your Attack pierces foes and deals +50% damage to Armor.

traits.name: Triple Bomb
traits.desc: You can use your Special 3 times in rapid succession.

traits.name: Rocket Bomb
traits.desc: Your Special is replaced with a rocket that deals 80 base damage.

traits.name: Targeting System
traits.desc: Foes targeted by your Special move slower and take +30% damage.

traits.name: Hazard Bomb
traits.desc: Your Special deals +300% base damage in a large area, but can hurt you.

traits.name: Cluster Bomb
traits.desc: Your Special fires a spread of 5 bombs, but each deals -30% damage.

traits.name: Seeking Fire
traits.desc: Your Attack seeks the nearest foe and deals +10% damage.

traits.name: Concentrated Beam
traits.desc: Your Igneus Eden Attack damage to a foe ramps up +100% faster.

traits.name: Flash Fire
traits.desc: Your Igneus Eden Attack starts firing and fires +50% faster with +15% range.

traits.name: Triple Beam
traits.desc: Your Igneus Eden Attack fires 3 beams in a spread pattern.

traits.name: Eternal Chamber
traits.desc: Your Igneus Eden has  ammo, but its damage no longer ramps.

traits.name: Greater Inferno
traits.desc: Your Igneus Eden Hellfire radiates +250% damage in a larger area.

traits.name: Myrmidon Bracer
traits.desc: Take 20/25/30% less damage from the front, but 10% more from the back.

traits.name: Black Shawl
traits.desc: Deal 10/15/20% damage striking undamaged foes; also striking foes from behind.

traits.name: Pierced Butterfly
traits.desc: Gain +1/1.5/2% damage for each Encounter you clear without taking damage.

traits.name: Bone Hourglass
traits.desc: Items from the Well of Charon have durations increased by +4/6/8 Encounters.

traits.name: Chthonic Coin Purse
traits.desc: Receive 100/125/150  to spend as you please (once per escape attempt).

traits.name: Skull Earring
traits.desc: Deal 20/30/40%  more damage while at 35%  or less.

traits.name: Distant Memory
traits.desc: Deal 10/20/30% more damage to distant foes (at least 500 units away).

traits.name: Harpy Feather Duster
traits.desc: Broken urns have a 3/5/6% chance to contain healing items.

traits.name: Lucky Tooth
traits.desc: Automatically restore up to 50/75/100  when your Life Total is depleted (once per escape attempt).

traits.name: Thunder Signet
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Zeus. His blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Conch Shell
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Poseidon. His blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Owl Pendant
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Athena. Her blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Eternal Rose
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Aphrodite. Her blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Blood-Filled Vial
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Ares. His blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Adamant Arrowhead
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Artemis. Her blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Overflowing Cup
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Dionysus. His blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Lambent Plume
traits.desc:
Gain +1.0/1.1/1.2% Dodge chance and move speed for each Encounter you clear quickly.
("Quickly" varies based on the encounter type and biome. More time will be offered in higher biomes, and in special encounters, such as bosses, mini-bosses, and Thanatos Encounters.)

traits.name: Frostbitten Horn
traits.desc: The next Boon you find will be from Demeter. Her blessings have +10/15/20% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Cosmic Egg
traits.desc: Enter Chaos Gates without losing . Blessings from Chaos have +20/30/40% chance to be Rare or better.

traits.name: Shattered Shackle
traits.desc: Your Attack, Special, and Cast each deal +50/75/100% damage while not empowered by a Boon.

traits.name: Evergreen Acorn
traits.desc: In the final encounter in each underworld region, take 0 damage the first 3/4/5 times foes hit you.

traits.name: Broken Spearpoint
traits.desc: After taking damage, become invulnerable for 1/1.25/1.5 sec. Refreshes after 7 Sec.

traits.name: Pom Blossom
traits.desc: After every 6/5/4 Encounters, gain +1 Lv. (a random Boon grows stronger).

traits.name: Sigil of the Dead
traits.desc: Your Call becomes Hades' Aid, which briefly makes you Invisible; your God Gauge starts 10/20/30% full.

traits.name: Companion Battie
traits.desc:
Your Summon deals 2500 damage in an area near your closest foe, then continually down the line.
** Cannot be used against any Fury Sisters

traits.name: Companion Mort
traits.desc:
Your Summon deals 3500 damage in an area in front of you, after a brief delay.
** Cannot be used in Thanatos's encounters

traits.name: Companion Rib
traits.desc:
Your Summon creates a distraction with 250, provoking your foes to attack it until it dies.
** Cannot be used against Charon

traits.name: Companion Shady
traits.desc:
Your Summon deals 1000 damage in an area and drops a smattering of , , and .
Drops per use:

1  pickup worth 10 
1  pickup, worth 30 
4  pickups, each healing 10

traits.name: Companion Fidi
traits.desc: Your Summon joins you for 30 sec, repeatedly firing shots that petrify foes and deal 70 damage.

traits.name: Companion Antos
traits.desc: Your Summon deals 1500 damage to 2 foes one after another.

traits.name: Aether Net
traits.desc: You start Encounter(s) with your God Gauge 15% full.

traits.name: Braid of Atlas
traits.desc: Your Cast deals +50% damage.

traits.name: Chimaera Jerky
traits.desc: Your Special deals +40% damage.

traits.name: Cyclops Jerky
traits.desc: Your Attack deals +30% damage.

traits.name: Eris Bangle
traits.desc: You deal +50% damage striking undamaged foes.

traits.name: Eye of Lamia
traits.desc: Slain foes have a 15% chance to drop healing items.

traits.name: Flame Wheels Release
traits.desc: Prevent Flame Wheel foes from appearing in Encounter(s).

traits.name: HydraLite
traits.desc: You recover 10%  when you enter a chamber.

traits.name: Ignited Ichor
traits.desc: Gain 20% move speed.

traits.name: Light of Ixion
traits.desc: Ensure a Chaos Gate will spawn ahead (where possible).

traits.name: Nail of Talos
traits.desc: You deal +50% damage to Armor.

traits.name: Nemesis Crest
traits.desc: You deal +50% damage striking foes from behind.

traits.name: Prometheus Stone
traits.desc: Gain +1  for your Cast.

traits.name: Skeletal Lure
traits.desc: Ensure a Fishing Point will spawn ahead (where possible).

traits.name: Stygian Shard
traits.desc: Traps deal +500% damage to your foes.

traits.name: Touch of Styx
traits.desc: Your Stubborn Defiance restores +10% . <temp>

traits.name: Trove Tracker
traits.desc: Ensure a Infernal Trove will spawn ahead (where possible).

traits.name: Yarn of Ariadne
traits.desc: The next Boon you find has upgraded Rarity.

traits.name: Refreshing Nectar
traits.desc: A rare and fragrant beverage; the next 3 Boons you find have upgraded Rarity.

traits.name: Heart of Stone
traits.desc: You believe in Bouldy, and Bouldy believes in you.

traits.name: Deus Ex Machina
traits.desc: Instantly makes you tougher, more so whenever you die. Death is not a big deal in the underworld. Try this if you find you're struggling, want focus on the story, or any reason.

traits.name: Loyalty Card
traits.desc: Reduce the price of Charon's items by 20%

traits.name: Darker Thirst
traits.desc: Whenever you find {!Icons.MetaPoint_Small} or {!Icons.GemSmall}, gain {#AltUpgradeFormat}+{$TooltipData.TooltipBonus}%{#PreviousFormat}.

traits.name: Dark Thirst
traits.desc: Whenever you find {!Icons.MetaPoint_Small}, gain {#AltUpgradeFormat}+{$TooltipData.TooltipBonus}%{#PreviousFormat}.

traits.name: meta_second_chance_large
traits.desc: TODO is this death defiance??????
